name: ashtech/about-history
title: About History
description: About history timeline with 8 editable milestones

event1Desc.default: Ashtech Group established with a vision to transform India's construction materials industry.

event2Desc.default: Pioneered fly ash brick manufacturing, setting new benchmarks in sustainable construction.

event3Desc.default: Entered large-scale infrastructure projects including power transmission systems.

event4Desc.default: Awarded for excellence in sustainable construction practices and quality management.

event5Desc.default: Achieved ISO 9001:2015 certification, reinforcing our commitment to global standards.

event6Desc.default: Diversified into renewable energy solutions and green building technologies.

event7Desc.default: Announced entry into luxury residential real estate with Ashtech Presidential Towers.

event8Desc.default: Officially unveiled our flagship residential project in Greater Noida West.
